Class OneDriveFactoryStateManager.Builder

java.lang.Object
com.amilesend.onedrive.OneDriveFactoryStateManager.Builder
Enclosing class:
OneDriveFactoryStateManager<T extends OneDrive>
public static class OneDriveFactoryStateManager.Builder extends Object
The builder for creating a new OneDriveFactoryStateManager.
